page.title: 10A STUDY OF HOUSEHOLD PETS
page.content: A study of 35 households in the village of Tremeirchion was carried out by the children of the village school.One question asked do you own a pet ?and if the answer was yes what type?The results are as follows.9 people did not own a pet.3 people had rabbits and another 3 households owned a budgerigar.9 households owned cats and only one household owned a canary. The most favoured animal was a dog.14 people owned one.One household kept hens as pets.Many reasons were chosen for the question why do you own a pet?The four main reasons were company, for the children,love of animals and working animals.
